title: Nest Learning Thermostats™, Access to a new waterfront park
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 922.0 Sq.
The Eddy is located along the waterfront in East Boston, boasting unrivaled views of the Boston skyline and within walking distance to an eclectic mix of restaurants, shops and entertainment.
The Eddy is transit-oriented and serves as a bridge between Boston's most vibrant neighborhoods.
Pricing and availability subject to change.
Well-designed living spaces, Locally-sourced and recycled-content materials, High-efficiency LED lighting, Energy Star-rated appliances, Nest Learning Thermostats™, Low-flow fixtures

Dog wash, Modern fitness facilities, Waterfront property with uninterrupted views of the Boston Harbor and city skyline, Fireplace, Lounge with a chef's kitchen, Outdoor terrace, Pet-friendly, Grilling stations, Bike maintenance facilities, Secure bike parking, Access to boat landing, Private conference rooms, Well-served by transit through the blue line, an expanded water taxi station, highways and Logan Airport, Sun deck, Pool, Poolside restaurant service for residents, On-site restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining spaces, Music room, Direct access to Lo Presti Park, Car sharing options, Access to a new waterfront park, Rooftop deck with seating and 270° views
